description: Expendable text input field with HTML formatting, including style, image, links... This widget is based on textAngular.

properties.label: Required
properties.name: required
properties.help: In the context of a form container, use $form.$invalid as a Boolean to check form validity in a widget property

properties.label: Interpret HTML
properties.name: allowHTML
properties.help: If you choose 'no', HTML code will be escaped instead of being interpreted. If you choose ‘Yes’, this could potentially lead to HTML injections attacks. Please take into account these risks.

properties.label: Value min length
properties.name: minLength
properties.help: In the context of a form container, use $form.$invalid as a Boolean to check form validity in a widget property

properties.label: Value max length
properties.name: maxLength
properties.help: In the context of a form container, use $form.$invalid as a Boolean to check form validity in a widget property

properties.label: Value
properties.name: value
properties.help: To pre-fill with a template, bind an HTML formatted variable
properties.caption: Variable content formatted in HTML

properties.label: Style toolbar
properties.name: toolbarsGrp1
properties.help: Subgroup of toolbar buttons to structure the text
properties.caption: Available values: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, ul, ol

properties.label: Formatting toolbar
properties.name: toolbarsGrp2
properties.help: Subgroup of toolbar buttons to set how the text looks
properties.caption: Available values: bold, italics, underline, strikeThrough, pre, quote

properties.label: Alignment toolbar
properties.name: toolbarsGrp3
properties.help: Subgroup of toolbar buttons to arrange the text layout
properties.caption: Available values: justifyLeft, justifyCenter, justifyRight, indent, outdent

properties.label: Miscellaneous toolbar
properties.name: toolbarsGrp4
properties.help: Subgroup of toolbar buttons for extra options
properties.caption: Available values: html, insertImage, insertLink, insertVideo, wordcount, charcount, undo, redo, clear
